header.title: Ridiculous! Conservative MP blames BREXIT for SEXIST attacks on women
header.subtitle: ATTACKS on female MPs and journalists from both the far-left and far-right have been “fed” by Brexit according to Conservative backbencher Antoinette Sandbach, who added that for politicians “the language since Brexit has substantially deteriorated”.
header.postText: Ms Sandbach made the incendiary remark during an appearance on BBC Newsnight. It follows claims Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn described Theresa May as a “stupid women” during yesterday’s Question Time. A professional lip-leader lent weight to the allegation, which Mr Corbyn denies.', 'During a debate on Mr Corbyn’s alleged comment, Ms Sandbach commented: “I think that the language since Brexit has substantially deteriorated.', '“There is a deep attack on women both from the far-right and the far-left and I think this has been fed by Brexit.”', 'Mr Corbyn insisted he said “stupid people” rather than “stupid women” adding he was “opposed to the use of sexist and misogynist language in any form”.', 'Commons Speaker, John Bercow, said he had not witnessed the alleged incident.', 'He added it had not been picked up by microphones, but it was “easy to see why the leader of the opposition’s words might be construed as ‘stupid woman’.”', 'He added a professional lipreader had been consulted, and had lent weight to the conclusion.', 'Ms Sandbach’s opinion was backed by Labour MP Rupa Huq, who appeared alongside her on Newsnight.', 'She said: “I do agree that since Brexit there’s been a coarsening of the debate.”', 'Ms Huq added she wasn’t sure whether Mr Corbyn said the alleged words and claimed lip readers came to differing conclusions.', 'During yesterday’s debate Commons leader Andrea Leadsom informed Speaker Bercow that he had yet to apologise for apparently describing her as a “stupid woman” during a previous debate.', 'Shortly after the Speaker’s Office commented that “strong and differing views” had been expressed.', 'Mr Bercow commented yesterday that he had dealt with the matter.
header.socioLingVar: Gender - General,Nationality - European or anti-Europeans,Sexual Identity - Transexuality,Ethnicity - Black,Physical Identity - Physical (and Mental) Impairments

commentThread.commentText: To think people like this woman are actually running the country is scary!
When you get ridiculous remarks like this from Sandbach it makes you wonder if Corbyn didn't have a point!!!

Strange that women are mostly on the remain side & the ones who are constantly working in the shadows to overturn democracy! You weren 't elected on a manifesto of transition to a totalitarian system based entirely on what nannie thinks best!!!!
Stupid bovine.

What do these women MPs expect ? They espouse a process that defies the will of the people, as decided in the 2016 referendum, by insisting that we back a deal Mays that ties us in to potentially decades of subservience to the EU, and loss of our sovereignty and right to self governance. We voted to LEAVE, Mays deal is not LEAVING. The only option presently available that meets the result of the referendum is to LEAVE under WTO rules. We managed before the EU existed, we will do well once out of its grasp. It’s sad that these remoaning women cannot see beyond their slavish admiration of the EU.
Was, perhaps, Mr Corbyn's jibe aimed at the wrong person Ms. Sandbach?

Cannot understand how Ms Sandbach managed to convince people to vote for her.  Perhaps Mr Corbyn could say a few things about her.  At the next election we must get rid of the halfwits and get  more MP's who have a few more brain cells than the rabble in there at the present.

Have heard it all now. Brexit is the cause of sexist remarks against women.Mrs May is a stupid women and a liar along with that other idiot Diane Abbott,and also the lady making the accusations.All i am saying is fact as most people will agree with me.Corbyn is also shown to be a liar as well.This is the people that are running our country God help us.
A right mountain out of a molehill.
Look love if you cant mix it in the big boys world keep out.
The trouble with women is they mainly see only in black and white, very little grey area. Calling them silly women is I think an understatement

This remark by Antoinette Sandbach clearly illustrates the poor quality of politicians we currently have to tolerate. This man/woman thing has got totally out of control, as for me if you can't take the pressure then throw in the towel.  Can we please get these wimps out of Parliament
Irresponsible to use this lame excuse for horrendous crimes!!

Lets not look at how the British people have been diluted to the point that the country is now full of imports and the British way of life no longer exists. It's a pity that you weren't able to put the referendum off for a few more years when you could have swelled the non British numbers by even more
This is my MP can’t wait for the next general election to vote against her, she talks so much crap

BREXIT has not led to a breakdown in respect - this has been caused by social media. A few years ago if you had a problem with politicians or anyone  you had to write them a letter.  I even to Jeremy Peace asking him to resign the chairmanship of West Bromwich Albion because he was useless.  Needless to say I did not get a thank you for my letter.  I wrote to many politicians but never received a thank you.
whats sexist about it?...maybe this proves women are inferior..
Women in all professions seem to have a tendency to blame their male counterparts for their own misfortunes and ineptitude.

replies.commentText: I undertstand that the truth eludes people like you.
If you say so. You are clutching at straws again. You jump at a comment without understanding the context.
"Truth is, you're probably a woman who has a male boss and who can't get a promotion lol." how does it sound that way round ?
Now isn't that being sexist on your part. Clutching at your straws again.

commentThread.commentText: there was a fire alarm activation where I worked yesterday, the new computer controlled locks tripped and there was a fault, I was locked out of my office, no key could be found. This didn't happen before we voted Leave, so many consequences we didn't foresee
This woman tells you all you need to know about how low the standards in Troughminster have dropped. The Swamp is in urgent need of draining and quickly.

Is it any wonder you have people using comments like stupid woman when you have A woman making ridiculous statements like this . If politicians don't like being ridiculed in this way make sure people you put forward for political office are capable of commanding a brief and being able to string a sentence together without committing a gaff man o r woman.

replies.commentText: Neither Sandbach or Huq acquitted themselves well on last nights Newsnight. Ms Huq especially would seem only have been there to go off issue to the extent that Emily Maitlis had to remind her what they were there to discuss.
